USER_HAS_UNSUPPORTED_PROVIDER: The user uses an unsupported provider
USER_HAS_NOT_PROVIDER: The user has not a provider
CUSTOMER_HAS_NOT_ACTIVE_PROVIDER: The customer has not a active provider
CANNOT_DECRYPT_STRING: Cannot decrypt string, probably this is not our encrypted string
CANNOT_FIND_USER_FROM_CALLBACK_STATE: Cannot find user from callback state
NEED_AUTH_FOR_REFRESH_STATIC_TOKEN: Need authorization for refresh static token
PROVIDER_OWNER_IS_NOT_A_CUSTOMER: The provider belongs to other customer
HAS_NOT_ACCESS_TOKEN_IN_RESPONSE: Has not access_token in response from the provider
HAS_NOT_EMAIL_IN_RESPONSE: Has not email in response from the provider
GOT_ERROR_ON_GETTING_USER_PROFILE: Got error when try to get the user profile from provider
GOT_ERROR_ON_REFRESH_USER_TOKEN: Got error when try to refresh the user access token
CANNOT_GET_PROVIDER_USER_DATA: Cannot get the user data from provider
